sentences.sContent: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.sCn: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.sContent: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.sCn: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

sentences.sContent: ...but nowadays it is mainly functioning as decoration...
...nowadays many students do not pay much attention to it...

trans.tranOther: now, compared with what happened in the past
